title: Gurdjieff (2 of 3) Introducing The Fourth Way to the West 1912-1
description:
The Life & Significance of George Ivanovitch Gurdjieff

3 part trilogy created and narrated by William Patrick Patterson 

 <a href="
http://www.gurdjieff.org/index.en.htm" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.gurdjieff.org/index.en.htm</a>





Part II ? Gurdjieff&#039;s Mission: Introducing the Fourth Way to the West, 1912?1924

Winner of the WorldFest 2002 Gold Special Jury Award for Outstanding Excellence. 
Shot on site in St. Petersburg, Moscow, Constantinople, London, Fontainebleau-en-Avon, New York and Lascaux, this documentary video - narrated by William Patrick Patterson and based on his book &#039;Struggle of the Magicians&#039; - retraces Gurdjieff&#039;s mission to introduce the teaching to the West. P.D. Ouspensky&#039;s and J.G. Bennett&#039;s enigmatic relationships with Gurdjieff are explored. Particularly stressed are the "St. Petersburg Conditions" and Gurdjieff&#039;s technique of "divine acting." The video vividly demonstrates Gurdjieff&#039;s warning to America of the rise and challenge of the East with footage recalling the 9/11 attack and its aftermath.
